Lo que mas me gusta de este juegazo es su increible hitbox, los killers pueden pegarte a metros de distancia, y tenes un plus si usas a la cazadora o al arponero ya que, las hachas y el arpon, pueden pasar por el mas m√≠nimo hueco que hay entre las estructuras.
No recomendable para gente con problemas del coraz√≥n, y no hablo por los sustos...

Really solid game. Feels good for the most part, has pretty decent matchmaking from what i can see. Fun but only if you know the fundamentals before picking it up. I advise watching some vids first and don't spend blood points until you're sure about where you're putting them. Game is $20 to get a good chunk of the content and all the DLC isn't necessary to make a kick ass build so don't think it's super pay to win. GREAT fun with friends. Especially if you all get a discord call. If you just want to have fun, do a custom and have the killer in the call too. Speaking in code is hilarious. Would for sure recommend for $20.
simplemente e p i c o

Unfair game with unbalanced ranked system. Why?

- Lots of trolls, camper&tunneller killers and unfair matchmaking

- Unbalanced killers. For example, Bubba(Leatherface) is only exists for exhilarate unskilled killers to not to quit the game while survivor players suffering from anxiety. Marketing tactics    I guess.

- Very poor matchmaking. In a match, there will always be at least 2 players who's rank is far below from you. Also the Killer probably will be rank 1 +3.000hrs dbdgod because there is no killer players at lower ranks.

- There is literally no leaving penalty at all. Players of this game is so whiny. When something bad happen to them,  they immediately leave. 

- There is no normal game mode in this game. 

- Tons of bugs.

 I am both thanking and cursing the developers. They made a great game and they ruined it.

Jogo muito bem feito, com graficos bons, inumeros mapas, estrategias, podendo juntar at√© 4 amigos como sobreviventes para jogar ou se preferir jogar solo, tem a op√ß√£o de killer. Jogo bem diferenciado com uma pegada totalmente diferente que outros jogos da classe "terror". O jogo conta com muitos recursos para o player que se interessar pelo jogo e deseja jogar tryhard. Al√©m de haver inumeras DLCs de filmes e jogos iconicos que marcaram o tema de "terror" que ficam com desconto frequentemente. Alem de varios eventos que ajudam os players a uparem skils tanto de survivors como de killers. Basicamente √© um dos melhores jogos de terror coop do mercado.

Most cancerous experience you'll ever have if the killer has shite internet expect to get hit through a pallet and if you decide maybe I need a break from getting hit through pallets  you go play killer and since you have good internet the pallets work how they should but besides that point you get in the game if you play trapper expect the gen to pop after setting 2traps also if you want to win you can only play 2killers out of the 24killers and even then its not fun because if the survivors rush the gens because the gen speeds are to fast the have the balls to teabag at the exit gate because they can hold mouse 1 all game they wont leave you have to force them out which wastes more of your life I hope before you buy this game you read this and put your money towards a better cause like huntshowdown thats pretty pog
